title: hextech chests and keys ( loot i already had ) removed after being issued a chat restriction
body: hextech chests and keys removed after being issued a chat restriction. i had 2 chests and 2 key frags in my loot before being issued a 10 game chat restriction ( i was having a bad day okay ) i get that you're not able to earn loot while being punished but what happened to my loot that was already there before the punishment? I've never heard of anyone's keys and chests being removed. all my skin shards and champ shards ect are still there , just the chests and key frags are gone . i thought it would come back after my punishment was over. i'm eligible to earn loot again also but my loot never returned

replies.body:
Chat restrictions do not remove hextech content, just prevents you from earning some after a game.  I looked into your case and don't see anything missing.  In case you are on the updated client, you could be having a syncing issue.  Just swap back to the legacy client and back.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Hope that helps clear things up!

i pretty much only use the legacy client , i have too many problems with the Alpha client (mostly due to my toaster of a laptop). my first game after the punishment i got the message in the post screen about how you can't earn loot so i went and clicked on my loot just to check it out and that's when i noticed they were gone. i tried logging in then out again (legacy client) and nothing was there. then i tried going into the Alpha client and nothing was there. i figured it was just part of the punishment and they would return once i was eligible to earn loot again but they're still gone. I'll try logging in and out again i guess but i have done so a few times already. thanks for looking into though
still not there no matter how many times i log in and out and on which client
